ygData.subject: Re: ___JBoots___
ygData.msgSnippet: A necro friend said he just put in 48 hours to get those boots. Haven t heard anything about reducing the time. Could there be anti-camp zones like some other
ygData.messageBody:
A necro friend said he just put in 48 hours to get
those boots. Haven't heard anything about reducing the
time. Could there be anti-camp zones like some other
mobs perhaps?

Belgarth

--- dracon_the_wizard <dracon_the_wizard@...>
wrote:
> From: "dracon_the_wizard"
> <dracon_the_wizard@...>
>
> I was camping in najena for Jboots for 6 hours and
> didnt see any boots, the
> guy that was first in line for the boots had been
> there for 26 hours
> straight and had only seen one pair! Is there some
> sort of trick or secret
> to obtain these boots?
